dcterms:description: Synthetic data produced using the CARLA Simulator, containing 2000 single-timestep complex outdoor driving scenes, each offering six outward-facing vehicle images and 100 spherical images for supervision.
dcterms:title: CARLA Dataset

dcterms:description: The NERDS360 dataset is utilized for sparse view synthesis of outdoor scenes, focusing on neural fields.
dcterms:title: NERDS360 Dataset

dcterms:description: The nuScenes dataset is a multimodal dataset for autonomous driving, providing various sensor data for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: nuScenes Dataset
